# we-slider

```html
<we-slider value=10 min=0 max=50>Slider 1</we-slider>
```

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute   | Description | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ----------- | ----------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled`  |             | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `max`      | `max`       |             | `number`  | `undefined` |
| `min`      | `min`       |             | `number`  | `undefined` |
| `onChange` | `on-change` |             | `any`     | `undefined` |
| `value`    | `value`     |             | `number`  | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event          | Description | Type               |
| -------------- | ----------- | ------------------ |
| `sliderChange` |             | `CustomEvent<any>` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                        | Description                                   |
| --------------------------- | --------------------------------------------- |
| `--label-margin`            | Margin label <br> Default: 0.2em              |
| `--label-padding`           | Padding label <br> Default: 0.2em             |
| `--slider-background-color` | Slider background color <br> Default: #D7DCDF |
| `--slider-disabled-color`   | Slider disabled color <br> Default: #aaa      |
| `--slider-height`           | Slider height <br> Default: 5px               |
| `--slider-margin`           | Slider margin <br> Default: 0                 |
| `--slider-padding`          | Slider padding <br> Default: 0                |
| `--slider-thumb-color`      | Slider thumb color <br> Default: #3F51B5      |
| `--slider-thumb-height`     | Slider thumb height <br> Default: 2em         |
| `--slider-thumb-radius`     | Slider thumb radius <br> Default: 50%         |
| `--slider-thumb-width`      | Slider thumb width <br> Default: 2em          |
| `--slider-width`            | Slider width <br> Default: 100%               |
